model

Class TDModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.TDModel

  • public class TDModel
extends java.util.Observable
    Purpose: Model for tower defense TD. 
     Stores data representing the state of a tower defense game.
 
 Public Methods:
   TDModel(int rows, int cols, int maxOnOne) - New model for a tower defense game state.
   addEntity(Entity entity, int row, int col) - Add a given Entity into the model at a given row column.
   removeEntity(Entity entity, int row, int col, boolean isSelling) - Removes a given Entity from the model at a given row column.
   nextStep() - Checks each Entity for their round actions and notifies observers.
   updateSpot(int col, int row, Entity moved) - Moves an Entity from one column to the column left of it.
   resume(int col, int row, List<List<List<Entity>>> gridCopy) - Iterates over zombie entities and has them resume walking.
   pause(int col, int row, boolean isPause) - Iterates over entities and pauses or resume them.
   changeSpeed(int col, int row, double t) - Iterates over entities and changes their speed.
   clearUp() - Clear the last round of grid by removing only enemy and tower entities.
   reset() - Resets the state of grid by removing entities.
   incrTurn() - Increment turn.
   roundOver(String entity) - Signifies that the round is over.
   Getters and Setters
    Author:
    Hualiang Qin, Louis Galluzzi, Clinton Kral, John Stockey

    • Constructor Detail

      • TDModel

        public TDModel(int rows,
               int cols)
        Purpose: New model for a tower defense game state. 
         Holds a row column based List of Lists of Lists of Entities 
 to store the game state.
        Parameters:
        rows - An int of the number of rows.
        cols - An int of the number of columns.

    • Method Detail

      • addEntity

        public boolean addEntity(Entity entity,
                         int row,
                         int col)
        Purpose: Add a given Entity into the model at a given row column. 
         Takes in an entity and places it into the model at the appropriate 
 row and column.
        Parameters:
        entity - An entity to place in the model.
        row - An int of the row to place it at.
        col - An int of the column to place it at.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating the successful placement of the entity.

      • removeEntity

        public boolean removeEntity(Entity entity,
                            int row,
                            int col,
                            boolean isSelling)
        Purpose: Removes a given Entity from the model at a given row column. 
         Takes in an entity and removes it from the model at the appropriate 
 row and column.
        Parameters:
        entity - An entity to removed from the model.
        row - An int of the row to remove at.
        col - An int of the column to remove at.
        isSelling - A boolean indicating if selling towers.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating the successful removal of the entity.

      • nextStep

        public int nextStep()
        Purpose: Checks each Entity for their round actions and notifies observers.
        Returns:
        int indicating round continuation, loss, or win.

      • updateSpot

        public void updateSpot(int col,
                       int row,
                       Entity moved)
        Purpose: Moves an Entity from one column to the column left of it. 
         Updates the state grid by moving the designated entity to the column 1 
 space to the left and then removes it from the column it's on.
        Parameters:
        col - An int of the column the entity is on.
        row - An int of the row the entity is on.
        moved - An Entity of the entity to move.

      • resume

        public void resume(int col,
                   int row,
                   java.util.List<java.util.List<java.util.List<Entity>>> gridCopy)
        Purpose: Iterates over zombie entities and has them resume walking.
        Parameters:
        col - An int of the column the Entity is on.
        row - An int of the row the Entity is on.
        gridCopy - A List<List<List<Entity>>> of the grid for iterating over.

      • pause

        public void pause(int col,
                  int row,
                  boolean isPause)
        Purpose: Iterates over entities and pauses or resume them.
        Parameters:
        col - An int of the column the Entity is on.
        row - An int of the row the Entity is on.
        isPause - A boolean indicating if pausing or resuming.

                        int row,

        Purpose: Iterates over entities and changes their speed.
        Parameters:
        col - An int of the column the Entity is on.
        row - An int of the row the Entity is on.
        t - A double of the speed to change to.

        Returns:

        Returns:
        boolean indicating successful reset.

        Purpose: Signifies that the round is over.
        Parameters:
        entity - String of the entity winning the round.

      • enemyAction

        private boolean enemyAction(int row,
                            int col,
                            int position,
                            java.util.List<java.util.List<java.util.List<Entity>>> gridCopy)
        Purpose: Performs actions on known enemy entity types. 
         Using row, col, and position, live state Entities are obtained from the state 
 grid. Towers are dealt damage to, but otherwise the enemy Entity at the row, col, 
 and position location will progress to the left.
        Parameters:
        row - An int of the row being checked.
        col - An int of the column being checked.
        position - An int of the Entity's position.
        gridCopy - A List<List<List<Entity>>> of the grid for moving entries.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if round continues (was not lost).

      • damageTower

        private void damageTower(int row,
                         int col,
                         int position,
                         java.util.List<java.util.List<java.util.List<Entity>>> gridCopy)
        Purpose: Attacks towers to the left of the row, col, position position. 
         row, col, and position specify the original Entity location.
 The copy of the state grid is required to prevent iteration from being 
 performed correctly due to removing and adding elements, in the event of 
 defeated towers.
        Parameters:
        row - An int of the row the enemy is on.
        col - An int of the column the enemy is on.
        position - An int of the enemy's position in its queue.
        gridCopy - A List<List<List<Entity>>> of the grid for getting and moving entries.

      • towerAction

        private void towerAction(int row,
                         int col,
                         int position,
                         int range,
                         int hits,
                         java.util.List<java.util.List<java.util.List<Entity>>> gridCopy)
        Purpose: Performs actions on known tower entity types. 
         Uses range to check for enemies to hit in the row.
        Parameters:
        row - An int of the row being checked.
        col - An int of the column being checked.
        position - An int of the Entity's position.
        range - An int of the tower's attack range.
        hits - An int of the tower's attack penetration.
        gridCopy - A List<List<List<Entity>>> of the grid for handling entries.

      • damageEnemy

        private void damageEnemy(int row,
                         int col,
                         int hitsLeft,
                         Entity tower,
                         Entity enemy)
        Purpose: Attacks enemies using the tower 
         row, col, specify the enemy location for removing on death.
        Parameters:
        row - An int of the row the tower and enemy are on.
        col - An int of the column the enemy is on.
        hitsLeft - An int of how many hits a projectile has left to make.
        tower - An Entity of the tower attacking.
        enemy - An Entity of the enemy being attacked.
